```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(leaflet)

tourist_site <-fread("dataset tempat perlancongan Malaysia.csv")

tourist_site[, site_label := paste0(Negeri, ", " ,`Nama Tempat`)]
```


## Leaflet Map

```{r }
leaflet(tourist_site) %>%
    addTiles() %>%
    addMarkers(~Longitude, ~Latitude, label = ~site_label )
```
